00011 #include "TypeDistribution.h"
00012 
00013 #include <mcMd/simulation/Simulation.h>
00014 #include <mcMd/species/Species.h>
00015 #include <mcMd/species/SpeciesMutator.h>
00016 #include <util/format/Dbl.h>
00017 #include <util/format/Int.h>
00018 #include <mcMd/util/FileMaster.h>
00019 
00020 namespace McMd
00021 {
00022 
00023    using namespace Util;
00024 
00025    // Constructor
00026    TypeDistribution::TypeDistribution(McSystem& system)
00027     : SystemDiagnostic<McSystem>(system),
00028       outputFile_(),
00029       distribution_(),
00030       nSample_(0),
00031       speciesId_(-1),
00032       nState_(-1),
00033       speciesPtr_(0),
00034       mutatorPtr_(0)
00035    {}
00036 
00037    void TypeDistribution::readParam(std::istream& in)
00038    {
00039       readInterval(in);
00040       readOutputFileName(in);
00041       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00042 
00043       speciesPtr_ = &(system().simulation().species(speciesId_));
00044       if (!speciesPtr_->isMutable()) {
00045          UTIL_THROW("Error: Species must be mutable");
00046       }
00047       mutatorPtr_ = &speciesPtr_->mutator();
00048       nState_ = mutatorPtr_->nState();
00049 
00050       // Allocate IntDistribution accumulator
00051       distribution_.allocate(nState_);
00052       for (int i = 0; i < nState_; ++i) {
00053          distribution_[i] = 0;
00054       }
00055 
00056    }
00057  
00058    // Evaluate energy and print.
00059    void TypeDistribution::sample(long iStep) 
00060    {
00061       if (isAtInterval(iStep)) {
00062 
00063          for (int i = 0; i < nState_; ++i) {
00064             distribution_[i] += mutatorPtr_->stateOccupancy(i);
00065          }
00066          ++nSample_;
00067 
00068       }
00069    }
00070  
00071    /*
00072    * Summary
00073    */
00074    void TypeDistribution::output() 
00075    {
00076       // Open and write summary file
00077       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00078 
00079 
00080       double norm = 1.0/double(nSample_);
00081       for (int i = 0; i < nState_; ++i) {
00082          outputFile_ << Int(i,5) 
00083                      << Dbl(distribution_[i]*norm, 15) << std::endl;
00084       }
00085       outputFile_.close();
00086    }
00087    
00088 }
00089 #endif
